00001 #include "c3DSModel.h"

00004 // Load 3DS model
00005 c3DSModel::c3DSModel(std::string filename) {
00006         m_TotalFaces = 0;
00007         
00008         m_model = lib3ds_file_load(filename.c_str());
00009         // If loading the model failed, we throw an exception
00010         if(!m_model) throw strcat((char*)"Unable to load ", filename.c_str()); 
00011         
00012         // generate the bounding box and put opposite corners into bbmin and bbmax.
00013         lib3ds_file_bounding_box_of_objects(m_model, true, false, false, bbmin, bbmax);
00014 
00015         this->CreateVBO();
00016 }
00017 
00018 // Destructor
00019 c3DSModel::~c3DSModel() {
00020         glDeleteBuffers(1, &m_VertexVBO);
00021         glDeleteBuffers(1, &m_NormalVBO);
00022         glDeleteBuffers(1, &m_TexCoordVBO);
00023         
00024         if(m_model != NULL) lib3ds_file_free(m_model);
00025 }
00026 
00027 // Copy vertices and normals to the memory of the GPU
00028 void c3DSModel::CreateVBO() {
00029         if (m_model == NULL) throw "m_model is NULL, ouch!";
00030         
00031         // Calculate the number of faces we have in total
00032         GetFaces();
00033         
00034         // Allocate memory for our vertices and normals
00035         Lib3dsVector * vertices = new Lib3dsVector[m_TotalFaces * 3];
00036         Lib3dsVector * normals = new Lib3dsVector[m_TotalFaces * 3];
00037         Lib3dsTexel * texCoords = new Lib3dsTexel[m_TotalFaces * 3];
00038            
00039         Lib3dsMesh * mesh;
00040         unsigned int FinishedFaces = 0;
00041         // Loop through all the meshes
00042         for(mesh = m_model->meshes;mesh != NULL;mesh = mesh->next) {
00043                 lib3ds_mesh_calculate_normals(mesh, &normals[FinishedFaces*3]);
00044                 // Loop through every face
00045                 for(unsigned int cur_face = 0; cur_face < mesh->faces;cur_face++) {
00046                         Lib3dsFace * face = &mesh->faceL[cur_face];
00047                         for(unsigned int i = 0;i < 3;i++) {
00048                                  if(mesh->texels) { // If there are texture-coordinates.
00049                          memcpy(&texCoords[FinishedFaces*3 + i], mesh->texelL[face->points[ i ]], sizeof(Lib3dsTexel)); 
00050                     }
00051                                 memcpy(&vertices[FinishedFaces*3 + i], mesh->pointL[face->points[i]].pos, sizeof(Lib3dsVector));
00052                         }
00053                         FinishedFaces++;
00054                 }
00055         }
00056         
00057         // Generate a Vertex Buffer Object and store it with our vertices
00058         glGenBuffers(1, &m_VertexVBO);
00059         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_VertexVBO);
00060         glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(Lib3dsVector) * 3 * m_TotalFaces, vertices, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00061         
00062         // Generate another Vertex Buffer Object and store the normals in it
00063         glGenBuffers(1, &m_NormalVBO);
00064         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_NormalVBO);
00065         glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(Lib3dsVector) * 3 * m_TotalFaces, normals, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00066         
00067         // Generate a third VBO and store the texture coordinates in it. 
00068     glGenBuffers(1, &m_TexCoordVBO);
00069     glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_TexCoordVBO);
00070     glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(Lib3dsTexel) * 3 * m_TotalFaces, texCoords, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00071         
00072         // Clean up our allocated memory (data is now in GPU)
00073         delete vertices;
00074         delete normals;
00075         delete texCoords;
00076         
00077         // We no longer need lib3ds
00078         lib3ds_file_free(m_model);
00079         m_model = NULL;
00080 }
00081 
00082 // Count the total number of faces this model has
00083 void c3DSModel::GetFaces()
00084 {
00085         if(m_model == NULL) throw "m_model is NULL. Ouch!";
00086         
00087         m_TotalFaces = 0;
00088         Lib3dsMesh * mesh;
00089         // Loop through every mesh
00090         for(mesh = m_model->meshes;mesh != NULL;mesh = mesh->next) {
00091                 // Add the number of faces this mesh has to the total faces
00092                 m_TotalFaces += mesh->faces;
00093         }
00094 }
00095 
00096 // Render the model using Vertex Buffer Objects
00097 void c3DSModel::Draw() const
00098 {
00099         if(m_TotalFaces == 0) throw "m_TotalFaces is 0. Ouch!";
00100         
00101         // Enable vertex and normal arrays
00102         glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00103         glEnableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY);
00104         glEnableClientState(GL_TEXTURE_COORD_ARRAY); 
00105         
00106         // Bind the vbo with the normals
00107         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_NormalVBO);
00108         
00109         // The pointer for the normals is NULL which means that OpenGL will use the currently bound vbo
00110         glNormalPointer(GL_FLOAT, 0, NULL);
00111         
00112         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_TexCoordVBO);     
00113     glTexCoordPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, NULL);
00114         
00115         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_VertexVBO);
00116         glVertexPointer(3, GL_FLOAT, 0, NULL);
00117         
00118         // Render the triangles
00119         glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, 0, m_TotalFaces * 3);
00120         
00121         glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00122         glDisableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY);
00123         glDisableClientState(GL_TEXTURE_COORD_ARRAY);
00124         
00125 }

00139                 glVertex3f(bbmin[0], bbmax[1], bbmin[2]);
